sqlMap.select:
/* ConnectLogDAO.selectConnectLogList */ SELECT A.* ,B.USER_NM ,B.AGENCY_CD ,fn_ct_get_code_name('agency_cd', B.AGENCY_CD) AS AGENCY_CD_VIEW ,fn_ct_get_code_name('conect_mthd', A.CONECT_MTHD) AS CONECT_MTHD_VIEW ,TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CREAT_DT_VIEW FROM TB_WEB_IT_USERCONNECT A ,TB_WEB_IT_USER B WHERE 1=1 AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
A.USER_ID LIKE '%'||#sUserId#||'%'
B.USER_NM LIKE '%'||#sUserNm#||'%'
A.CREAT_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE( #stdate# || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE( #eddate# || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY A.CREAT_DT DESC
